name: override
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: (of a person who has the necessary authority) to decide against or refuse to accept a previous decision, an order, a person, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （拥有必要权威的人）否决，推翻，撤销，使无效

example.eg: Every time I make a suggestion at work, my boss overrides me/it.
example.egtrans: 每次我对工作提出建议，我的老板都不听。

example.eg: The president used his veto to override the committee's decision.
example.egtrans: 总裁利用手中的否决权推翻了委员会的决定。

trans_examp.trans_en: to operate an automatic machine by hand
trans_examp.trans_cn: 对（自动机器）改用手控；超驰控制，超控

example.eg: He overrode the autopilot when he realized it was malfunctioning.
example.egtrans: 他意识到自动驾驶仪出了故障，就改为手动驾驶。

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to take control over something, especially in order to change the way it operates
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指为改变运作方式而）操控，制服

example.eg: The pills are designed to override your body's own hormones.
example.egtrans: 这些药片用以调节人体自身的荷尔蒙分泌。

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to be more important than something

example.eg: Parents' concern for their children's future often overrides all their other concerns.
example.egtrans: 父母对子女未来的考虑往往重于他们对其他任何事情的关心。

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to travel on public transport further than your ticket allows you to
trans_examp.trans_cn: （公共交通工具）超程乘车（实际距离超出车票允许的距离）

example.eg: There is a $20 penalty for passengers who travel without a ticket or override.
example.egtrans: 无票旅行或超程旅行的乘客将受到20美元的处罚。

name: override
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a device that changes the control of a machine or system in special situations, especially from automatic to manual
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指从自动改为手动的）超控装置

example.eg: The heating system has a manual override.
example.egtrans: 这套取暖系统有一个手动超控装置。

dsense.name: override
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: in American politics, an occasion when an elected group of people refuses to accept a decision made by an elected leader
trans_examp.trans_cn: （美国政治中对选举产生的领导人所作决定的）否决，推翻

example.eg: The vote fell short of the majority needed for an override of the Governor's veto.
example.egtrans: 投票未过半数，未能推翻州长的否决。
